class volunteers.models.Volunteer(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Model representing a Volunteer.

Parameters:

  • first_name (str) – First name of the volunteer.

  • last_name (str) – Last name of the volunteer.

  • email (str) – Email address of the volunteer.

Returns:

A string representation of the Volunteer object, displaying their full name.

Return type:

str

volunteers.views.signup_view(request)[source]

View function to handle user signup and save the submitted form data.

Parameters:

request (django.http.HttpRequest) – HttpRequest object representing the incoming request from the user.

Returns:

HttpResponse object representing the response to redirect the user to the ‘home’ page upon successful signup, or render the ‘signup.html’ template with an empty form for GET requests.

Return type:

django.http.HttpResponse

View function to display a list of volunteers.

Parameters:

request (django.http.HttpRequest) – HttpRequest object representing the incoming request from the user.

Returns:

HttpResponse object representing the rendered response containing the list of volunteers.

Return type:

django.http.HttpResponse
